attr.title: Forager
attr.desc:
Forager is a 2D open world game inspired by exploration, farming and crafting games such as Stardew Valley, Terraria & Zelda!

Note: Only the Steam Version works. The Linux version is 2.0.4 is not as up to date as the Windows version. Small text makes it hard to read descriptions on devices with small screens.
attr.inst:
Purchase Forager from Steam.

Download the Linux version:
Run Steam console via Windows+R. Type `steam://open/console` into the run dialog. In the console, download the Linux version by typing `download_depot 751780 751783 3324194938480079153`. When the download is complete, the console will tell you the location of the folder. Copy all files from `/assets` to `/ports/forager/assets`.
